queries.exists: SELECT 1 FROM programs WHERE name = 'Cursor' AND publisher = 'Anysphere';

refs.b619cea7:
# Learn more about .exe install scripts:
# http://fleetdm.com/learn-more-about/exe-install-scripts

winget install --id Anysphere.Cursor -e -h --accept-source-agreements --accept-package-agreements --scope machine
Exit $LASTEXITCODE
refs.fa78e71e:
# Uninstall Cursor using winget
winget uninstall --id Anysphere.Cursor -e
Exit $LASTEXITCODE
